content: *felted leaves brighten this autumn wreath each leaf is crocheted and felted before being applied use it on your door to decorate a thanksgiving table or at the base of pillar candles lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70450ad skill level easy level 2 lion® wool article #820 4 colors 1 ball each *ed note if you are substituting another yarn it must be 100% feltable wool if you plan to felt the project * crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm purchased craft wreath 11 in 28 cm in diameter hot glue gun special stitch decrease single_crochet decrease leaves are worked in row then felted instructions provided when leaves are dry glue to wreath form
